alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tippah; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 6:52AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tippah, Tishomingo, northern Prentiss and Alcorn Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 651 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hinkle, or 9 miles north of Booneville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Booneville, Iuka, J P Coleman State Park, Tishomingo State Park, Burnsville, Jumpertown, Glen, Tishomingo, Pineflat, Thrashers, Hinkle, Burton, Theo, Midway, Leedy, Farmington, Rienzi, Kossuth and Paden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
